item.title: Create Alert
item.description: This page shows you how to create Alerts using API or TravelgateX Web. How to request You must choose a type alert to create it. The alert types are: Error rate, No traffic, Average time and Peak traffic. There are different ways to configure the alert types. Bellow are a references of some values of configuration to create alert needed. Error rate alert WHAT IS NEEDED? window periodicity percentage minNumberRequests to check to compare check by time frame w > 0 p > 0 pg >= 0 mnr >= 0 error codes error codes check by requests number w = 0 p = 0 pg >= 0 mnr > 0 error codes error codes By default to check is all error codes excepts 0 and to compare is all error codes.
